statements: SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE application_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE applicant_age > 30 ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE application_status = 'approved';
SELECT applicant_name, application_status FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE applicant_age <= 25 ORDER BY applicant_name ASC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_age, application_status FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE applicant_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY application_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE applicant_age > 18 ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT applicant_name, application_status FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE application_status = 'Pending'
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM CitizenshipApplications ORDER BY applicant_name ASC
SELECT * FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(application_id) AS total_applications FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE application_status = 'Approved'
SELECT * FROM applicant_details;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email FROM applicant_details WHERE applicant_id = 1;
SELECT applicant_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM applicant_details ORDER BY applicant_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM application_status WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT applicant_name, status_date FROM applicant_details JOIN application_status ON applicant_details.applicant_id = application_status.applicant_id;
SELECT * FROM applicant_details WHERE applicant_id = 100;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email FROM applicant_details ORDER BY applicant_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_applicants FROM applicant_details;
SELECT applicant_name, status FROM applicant_details INNER JOIN application_status ON applicant_details.applicant_id = application_status.applicant_id WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM applicant_details WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM applicants;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age FROM applicants WHERE applicant_age > 30;
SELECT applicant_id, applicant_nationality FROM applicants ORDER BY applicant_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM application_status WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT applicant_name, document_type FROM applicants JOIN documents ON applicants.applicant_id = documents.applicant_id;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age, applicant_nationality FROM applicants WHERE applicant_age > 30 ORDER BY applicant_name ASC
SELECT * FROM applicants WHERE applicant_nationality = 'USA' AND application_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY application_date DESC
SELECT a.applicant_name, d.document_type, d.document_url FROM applicants a JOIN documents d ON a.applicant_id = d.applicant_id WHERE d.document_type = 'Passport'
SELECT a.applicant_name, as.status, as.status_date FROM applicants a JOIN application_status as ON a.applicant_id = as.applicant_id WHERE as.status = 'Approved' ORDER BY as.status_date DESC
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age FROM applicants WHERE applicant_age < 25 OR applicant_nationality = 'Canada' ORDER BY applicant_name DESC, applicant_age ASC
SELECT * FROM citizenship_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM citizenship_applications WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT applicant_name, status FROM citizenship_applications ORDER BY applicant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM application_details WHERE document_type='Passport' AND document_details LIKE '%expiration%';
SELECT applicant_name, update_date, status_description FROM citizenship_applications JOIN status_updates ON citizenship_applications.applicant_id = status_updates.application_id;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC, applicant_name ASC;
SELECT applicant_id, applicant_name FROM citizenship_applications WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT a.applicant_name, b.document_type FROM citizenship_applications a JOIN application_details b ON a.applicant_id = b.applicant_id WHERE b.document_type LIKE '%passport%';
SELECT a.applicant_name, b.document_details FROM citizenship_applications a JOIN application_details b ON a.applicant_id = b.applicant_id WHERE b.document_details IS NOT NULL;

SELECT applicant_name, update_date, status_description FROM citizenship_applications a JOIN status_updates b ON a.applicant_id = b.application_id WHERE a.status = 'Approved' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM applicants;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM applicants;
SELECT applicant_id, name FROM applicants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'Passport';
SELECT applicant_id, status, update_date FROM status_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM applicants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT applicant_id, name, nationality FROM applicants WHERE nationality = 'USA' AND age > 25 ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT a.name, a.age, d.document_type FROM applicants a JOIN documents d ON a.applicant_id = d.applicant_id WHERE d.document_type = 'Passport' AND a.age < 40 ORDER BY a.name, d.document_type;

SELECT a.name, s.status, s.update_date FROM applicants a JOIN status_updates s ON a.applicant_id = s.applicant_id WHERE s.status = 'Under Review' AND a.nationality = 'Canada' ORDER BY s.update_date DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT r.rejection_date, r.reason, a.name, a.age, a.nationality FROM rejections r JOIN applicants a ON r.applicant_id = a.applicant_id WHERE r.reason LIKE '%incomplete%' ORDER BY r.rejection_date DESC;
